title: IMS LD Standard-Based Science Learning Unit Reuse and Adaptive Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory knowledge, data analysis comprehension, and VR device usage experience
context.additional_context: Analysis of learning logs across various VLE (Virtual Learning Environment) systems to reuse learning units in standardized IMS LD format and generate personalized adaptive learning pathways.

learning_goals: Extracts the learning flow structure of science experiment simulations with 90% accuracy through process mining of learning logs
Implements a learner-level-adaptive VR content recommendation algorithm based on decision-tree-based rule learning
Generates learning design documents compliant with IMS LD standards, ensuring over 80% reusability across platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
